title: User Profile Management System
content:
# User Profile Management System

## Database Schema
```sql
CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  phone VARCHAR(20),
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE addresses (
  address_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id VARCHAR(50),
  type VARCHAR(20), -- 'shipping' or 'billing'
  is_default BOOLEAN,
  street VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  state VARCHAR(50),
  zip VARCHAR(20),
  country VARCHAR(50)
);
```

## Features

### Profile Information
- Name, email, phone
- Profile picture (S3 storage)
- Preferences
- Communication settings

### Address Management
- Multiple addresses per user
- Default shipping/billing
- Address validation via API
- Geocoding for delivery estimates

### Preferences
- Language
- Currency
- Timezone
- Newsletter opt-in
- Marketing preferences

## API Endpoints
GET /api/v1/users/{user_id}
PUT /api/v1/users/{user_id}
GET /api/v1/users/{user_id}/addresses
POST /api/v1/users/{user_id}/addresses

## Validation
- Email format check
- Phone number validation
- Address verification via USPS
- Image size limit: 5MB

## Privacy
- GDPR: Right to be forgotten
- Data export on request
- Audit log of changes
- Encrypted sensitive fields
